Press: Chapman Graduate Aidan Jones (’19) Reflects Upon his Journey in Presenting Undergraduate Research

Published: Aug 28, 2019
Last Updated: Oct 11, 2020

It’s weird to have press for the first time! A story was written about my most recent research and my research journey by the Center for Undergraduate Excellence at Chapman University.
